attributes.action: School remain close or parents be given option not to send kids until its safe
attributes.additional_details:
Government wants to reopen schools but it is a major concern by parents that while the deadly virus is around and WHO has clear guidelines of keeping distance of 2 meters & limit contact with other people.How the schools can maintain this? A teacher need to be in contact with young kids which itself become a reason to spread the disease.
If a child pick it up at school, child himself, parents or grandparents who could be vulnerable, which may cause more serious situation as loss of caregivers.
attributes.background: Government should make arrangements for home schooling as long as its not 100% safe or a vaccine or cure is made. Or atleast it should allow home schooling for the parents who can afford to keep there kids safe at home.
